text: Álvaro Alberto Saborío Chacón (; born 25 March 1982) is a Costa Rican professional footballer, who plays as a forward, who most recently played for Costa Rican side A.D. San Carlos. Saborío originally retired in 2017, but returned months later. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Apps Goals Saprissa 2001–02 24 11 2002–03 36 27 2003–04 37 25 2004–05 21 15 2005–06 31 17 Total 149 95 Sion 2006–07 31 14 2007–08 34 17 2008–09 22 5 Total 87 36 Bristol City (loan) 2009–10 19 2 Real Salt Lake 2010 27 12 2011 23 11 2012 31 17 2013 16 12 2014 16 8 2015 14 3 Total 127 63 D.C.
